name: HyperAgents
description: HyperAgents is an ANR/SNF project working towards the deployment of world-wide hybrid communities of people and artificial agents on the Web.

name: LoireConnecTID
description: LoireConnecTID addresses two major challenges: Improving the organisation of public structures. Developing and diversifying the services offered to users.

name: KGBot
description: KGBot (Knowledge Graph chatBot) aims to enhance an AI-powered chemistry chatbot prototype designed to improve the accessibility and usability of metabolomics KGs.

name: MetaboLinkAI
description: MetaboLinkAI is a multinational research project dedicated to revolutionizing metabolomics data interpretation.
